MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G77 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 09.23am. Our team are on site and has advised repairs are taking longer than expected because of complexity of the work required and the team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:48am on Wednesday, 13 January 2021
